message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share this round, but we can work towards a more even split in the future.
Your share loses value quickly, Alice. How about a more reasonable split this time?
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a decent share.  We can work towards a more equitable split as we go.
The clock is ticking, Alice. This offer is fair considering the time pressure and your diminishing returns.
